description:
Challenging fun and excitement in just ten seconds!

Back in the 8-bit glory days, Hudson's own "Takahashi Meijin" a.k.a. "Master Higgins," made a splash in the gaming world with his 16 shots per second. Can YOU break his record?

Also, there's an analysis feature that breaks down your stats.

If you get a high score, you can leave your signature using the Touch Screen. Get your family and friends to compete for some serious rapid-fire fun!
name:
16 Shot!
SHOOTING WATCH
